parameters.content:
## OpenRouter Model Availability Monitor

Scans all workflows for OpenRouter model references and checks if they're still available.

### Setup

1. Set Error Workflow in settings to your error handler
2. Adjust schedule as needed (default: weekly)

### What it detects

- LangChain OpenRouter Chat Model nodes
- HTTP Request nodes calling openrouter.ai
- OpenAI nodes with model IDs containing /
